DialogueText.Text: Our Master has taken a great interest in you, though after our run-in at those old ruins, I can't say I see why. Nevertheless, you have been invited into our Order, and I am here to answer any questions you may have.

Our Master is known to many as simply The Orator for it is their words that we live by. It is they who guide us towards a brighter future, and it is they who has uplifted us all with this greater purpose. You should be honored to have been invited into our Order by them personally.

Our order has, for a long time now, worked in the shadows; preparing for what is soon to transpire... Opening the path is our goal, and once we succeed, our world shall be repainted into a more perfect image. No longer will we live in fear of those who have held dominion over us for so long.

Your actions have peaked the interest of our Master; he sees great promise in you. There are few who could change our world in such a way as you. I just hope you see things as we do, and not dare to stand against us as you have before.
You may come to learn more of our Order in the coming days if you are truly devoted to our cause. If you are not, well... Our master will certainly not take kindly to it.

. It will serve as a means of communication. Should you hear its hum, you will know you have been called upon, and it shall guide you to where you are needed... Do be sure to keep it on you, lest you miss the call.
That is all you need know for the time being. More shall be revealed soon, so long as you heed the Tablet's call. Farewell. If you are wise, we shall meet again.
